metadata.title: Description des arts et métiers
metadata.creator: Moutard, Nicolas-Léger,b. 1742?
Moutard, Nicolas-Léger, b. 1742?
Académie royale des sciences (France)
metadata.publisher: [Paris] : Chez Moutard, libraire-imprimeur de la reine & de l'Académie royale des sciences, rue des Mathurins, Hôtel de Cluny
metadata.description: Catalog listing individual volumes of "Description des arts et métiers", issued by the Académie royal des sciences, 1761-1789, and sold by Moutard
Volumes listed as "sous presse" on p. [4] were published in 1780
"Le prix des cahiers séparés est diminué de deux cinquiemes, & celui de la collection entiere est réduit à moitié, & n'est que de 639 liv. pour les 86 cahiers"--P. [1]
Original and new discounted prices in parallel columns
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
